# unifi_port_forward (Resource)

Manages a UniFi port forwarding rule.

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "unifi_port_forward" "web_server" {
  name     = "HTTPS Inbound"
  protocol = "tcp"
  src      = "any"
  dst_port = "443"
  fwd      = "192.168.1.50" # Internal IP
  fwd_port = "443"
  enabled  = true
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `dst_port` (String) The destination port or port range.
- `fwd` (String) The forward-to IP address.
- `fwd_port` (String) The forward-to port or port range.
- `name` (String) The name of the port forwarding rule.
- `protocol` (String) The protocol for the port forwarding rule (e.g., tcp, udp, tcp_udp).

### Optional

- `enabled` (Boolean) Whether the port forwarding rule is enabled.
- `pfwd_interface` (String) The interface for the port forwarding rule (e.g., wan, wan2, both).
- `src` (String) The source IP or network.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of the port forwarding rule.
